descriptions.description:
Shootet combines the best parts of Galga, Tetris and Tron to create an addictive action puzzler that will keep you coming back for more! The game was created for the 'RIOT Tag-Team Coding Competition'.
Credits go to:
BLACKALiCE (godlikemcx.deviantart.com) for the graphics hrmnzr (soundcloud.com/hrmnzr) for the music mrz (mrzesn@t-online.de) for code
